sentences.english: The cumulative amount of controlled soil and water loss area in Pingchang county, Sichuan province is 782.

sentences.english: The first five months of 2008, the second-hand car totally maintained large increase of business volume.
sentences.chinese: 2008年前五个月，二手车累计交易量大幅增长。

sentences.english: In three days, it was re-posted over 100,000 times.
sentences.chinese: 在三天内就累计发布了10万次之多。

sentences.english: The accumulative total displacements at the measuring points on the base top and pile top are somewhat high.

sentences.english: The paper estimates the system reliability model technology, describes synthetic accumulation and the failure rate.
sentences.chinese: 预计系统的可靠性，介绍综合累计法和失效率模型。

sentences.english: The index is up almost 30 per cent this year.

sentences.english: To analyze the data of birth defect monitoring of Shanxi province by using cumulative sum method( CUSUM).

sentences.english: If eliminated the de-listed individual shares, there would be totally about 40% individual shares increased accumulatively this week.
